description: Build, maintain and support projects, deliver ecommerce websites with high level of detail, performance, best practices and clean code. Styling and ensuring user experience. Work closely with the QA team, UX/UI and technical leads to keep the process fast and effective.
As a freelance work, I built and style specific features, deliver high-quality code, accesible and clean.

Develop and apply engineering concepts to projects from scratch. Create features, components and styles for web pages oriented to finance, sports, time tracking, employee management. Ensure 100% tested and documented deliverables.
